metadata.title: Markdown to PDF Converter | tool-chest
metadata.description: Convert Markdown to professional PDF documents with syntax highlighting, custom styling, and support for tables, code blocks, and images. Privacy-first client-side processing.

pdfTemplates.title: PDF Templates
items: Default: Clean and simple design for general use
Academic: Professional format for research papers
Minimal: Clean design with lots of white space
Professional: Business-ready with headers and footers

howToUse.title: How to Use
items: Choose between typing in the editor or uploading a markdown file
Write or paste your markdown content in the editor
Use the live preview to see how your document will look
Select a template or customize styling options
Click 'Generate PDF' to create your document
